api.adapter.vim.openstack module¶

class api.adapter.vim.openstack.OpenstackVimAdapter(auth_url=None, username=None, password=None, identity_api_version=None, project_name=None, project_domain_name=None, user_domain_name=None, verify=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class of functions that map the ETSI standard operations exposed by the VIM to the operations exposed by the OpenStack Heat, Neutron and Nova clients.

server_get(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function retrieves the details for the server with the given ID.

Parameters:server_id – ID of the server to get details for.
Returns:Dictionary with server details.
server_list(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function gets the list of servers.

Parameters:query_filter – Filter out servers which don’t match the search_opts (optional). The search opts format is a dictionary of key / value pairs that will be appended to the query string.
Returns:List of ‘Server’ objects.
stack_get(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function gets the metadata for the specified stack ID.

stack_resource_list(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function shows a list of resources belonging to a stack.

Parameters:stack_id – ID of the stack to show the resources for.
Returns:List of ‘Resource’ objects.
stack_resume(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function resumes the stack with the given ID.

stack_suspend(**kwargs)[source]¶

This function suspends the stack with the given ID.
